body_html:
Ah, thanks for the explanation and for digging into this problem!

Can you add a unit test to ops_test.py? You can just create an Operation from a NodeDef and check that Operation.device returns the right value.
body_text:
Ah, thanks for the explanation and for digging into this problem!
Can you add a unit test to ops_test.py? You can just create an Operation from a NodeDef and check that Operation.device returns the right value.
body:
Ah, thanks for the explanation and for digging into this problem!

Can you add a unit test to ops_test.py? You can just create an Operation from a NodeDef and check that Operation.device returns the right value.
